summary: This bill designates the United States Postal Service facility located at 5225 Harrison Avenue in Rockford, Illinois, as the "Jay P. Larson Post Office Building." The bill specifies this designation will be used in all applicable legal documents and records of the United States. It was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 27, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. It is a straightforward bill with a very limited scope.
